intro: Saving Princess of Mars is an stylish action platformer featuring puzzles to solve and ton of enemies to eliminate.
description:
Our main protagonist is lumberjack Jack from Earth who surprisingly spawns on Mars where he's trying to save its princess.

Hand-Crafted levels: Each level is uniquely designed for countless methods of completion. Defeat strange Martian enemies using spontaneous approaches and eliminate them on your way to freedom.

Exceptional combat: Adapt to chaos with style: stomp enemies like you're squashing grapes at a festival, deliver kicks that would make a martial arts movie jealous, and turn every encounter into a slapstick ballet of traps and tumbles. No bullets, no mercy—just airborne justice and foot-powered fury.

Multiple controllable characters: You will be able to switch between different characters during the gameplay. All controllable characters have different abilities, but of course – our main hero is the strongest!

Unconventional Storytelling: A mysterious tale unfolds through cinematic sequences — like a movie that forgot it was a game, took a wrong turn at plot twist junction, and crash-landed into a finale so unexpected it might just file a complaint with reality itself.

Are you ready to help Jack save the Princess of Mars... and maybe the entire planet of Mars?

Game features:

- strange Martian enemies
- 4 playable characters
- 7 engaging large platformer levels
- up to 4 hours of gameplay
- unlockable Hard difficulty
- 42 in game achievements
- humoristic comments from characters during conversations
